org.kj.pxe.config.impl

Class DhcpSettingsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kj.pxe.config.impl.DhcpSettingsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DhcpSettings

    public class DhcpSettingsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DhcpSettings
    Gets the configurations from the dhcp.properties file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DhcpSettingsImpl(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructs a DhcpSettingsImpl that loads the properties from dhcp.properties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAckPort()
      Returns the port to which the DHCP Ack packet is sent by the client.
      java.lang.String getBootFileName()
      Returns the Boot File Name.
      java.net.InetAddress getBootServerAddress()
      Returns the BootStrap server address.
      int getDiscoverPort()
      Returns the port to which the DHCP Discover packet is sent by the client.
      java.lang.String getGpxeBootFileName()
      Returns the boot file name for gpxe clients
      java.lang.String getIpxeBootFileName()
      Returns the boot file name for ipxe clients.
      boolean getIpxeOfferToTftpRedirect()
      Should be turned on in case the ipxe client gets its boot information from a DHCP offer instead of carrying out the full protocol and wating for the ack.
      int getOfferPort()
      Returns the port to which the DHCP Offer packet is sent by the client.
      java.lang.String getOption93BootFileName()
      Returns the boot file name if it is supposed to be altered for clients based on DHCP option 93 (client system architecture)
      int getPoolCount()
      Returns the threadpool count per server.
      int getRequestPort()
      Returns the port to which the DHCP Request packet is sent by the client.
      short[] getVendorOptionBootItem()
      Returns the boot item vendor option as an array of 2 shorts.
      java.lang.String getVendorOptionBootMenu()
      Returns the boot menu vendor option as a String with they type and description separated by a comma.
      java.net.InetAddress getVendorOptionBootServer()
      Returns the InetAddress for the boot server vendor option.
      byte getVendorOptionDiscoveryControl()
      Returns the data field for the discovery control vendor option.
      java.lang.String getVendorOptionMenuPrompt()
      Returns the menu prompt for the menu prompt suboption in DHCP option 43

    • Constructor Detail

      • DhcpSettingsImpl

        public DhcpSettingsImpl(java.lang.String fileName)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a DhcpSettingsImpl that loads the properties from dhcp.properties
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file to read the properties from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error initializing a default InetAddress field - the default boot server address and the default server option address
        DhcpPropertiesReadingException - if the file is not found

      • getVendorOptionBootItem

        public short[] getVendorOptionBootItem()
        Returns the boot item vendor option as an array of 2 shorts. the first is the boot server type, the second is the layer.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
